title: Possible to find private browser window?
content: Despite turning all the ones I could find off, YouTube keeps preventing me from playing videos in my main browser saying I can't watch with adblockers on. So I've been opening all these tabs in private browsers. Wednesday night into Thursday morning I was playing a song I'd found but when the computer restarted it didn't reopen that page. Is there a way to find a private browser window I had open?
creator: jakomoro

title: Favicons keep duplicating in Bookmarks Toolbar
content: Multiple copies or duplication of bookmarks or favicons keep appearing in the Bookmarks Toolbar. I have stopped snc and changed sync PW. I delete them but after closing Firefox and restarting Firefox web-browser, they appear again. Can you explain why this is happening and how to apply a solution.
creator: iamvger

title: With Firefox update 138.0.1 links do not change color when they are clicked on.
content: With update 138.0.1 links do not change color when they are clicked on. Is there a way to fix this problem.
creator: debra19

title: UDL Helper
content: Salve, UDL helper da un po di tempo non funziona bene come prima, per scaricare un video è una tragedia! Ho fatto tante segnalazioni al tim di Helper e anche al tim di Firefox. Come mai una estensione libera non funziona più come dovrebbe? Nessuno mi ha ancora risolto il problema e neanche risposto!
creator: footeasejoi
